Comments_List: Writing a senior thesis has been really helpful for writing long papers and situating my work within a larger field in preparation for graduate school.
working independently, time management skills, editing and structuring a long form argument
I really learned how to engage with multiple different sources in order to answer a multi-dimensional research question.
Having the senior colloquium in the fall is really helpful for getting the groundwork and some pages written for the senior thesis!
would have been helpful to have more workshops/group editing oppourtunities this semester
I think the ER&M department did a great job of offering resources and guidance to the students pursuing year-long research projects.

I would recommend writing a senior thesis, especially for students looking into continuing their involvement in academia! It's a lot of work but really rewarding to learn that much, and to make and do the work to prove a new insight into a field.
